name: unreal-engine-python
description: Tools to assist when writing Python for Unreal Engine

unreal-engine-python.execute.showOutput.description: Display the output log when something is executed

unreal-engine-python.execute.clearOutput.description: Clear output log each time somethings new is executed.

unreal-engine-python.remote.multicastGro.markdownDescription: The multicast group endpoint _(must match the "Multicast Group Endpoint" setting in the Python plugin)_

unreal-engine-python.remote.multicastBin.markdownDescription: The adapter address that the UDP multicast socket should bind to, or 0.0.0.0 to bind to all adapters _(must match the "Multicast Bind Address" setting in the Python plugin)_

unreal-engine-python.remote.multicastTTL.markdownDescription: Multicast TTL _(0 is limited to the local host, 1 is limited to the local subnet)_

unreal-engine-python.remote.commandEndpo.markdownDescription: The endpoint for the TCP command connection hosted by this client _(that the remote client will connect to)_

unreal-engine-python.remote.timeout.markdownDescription: How many seconds to wait while trying to connect to Unreal Engine before terminating the command

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
